durakathana anka 071 8027361 â€“ upali, 071 8961159 â€“ aariyawansha we.no. 722/1, nalluruwa, panadura yana lipinaye padinchi em.pi. ayesh dhanushka piris (awurudu 21 ) namathi ayage wakugadu dekama akriya wi athi athara, ohuge jiwithaya bera ganimata haki ikmanin wakugaduwak baddha kala yuthu bawata waidyawarun nirdesha kara atha.ohuta baddha kirima sandaha â€œbi positiwâ€ wargaye wakugaduwak awashya wi athi athara, ee sandaha kamathi parithyagashiliyaku we nam ihatha nam sandahan lipinayata ho anka, 077 3834075 darana durakathana ankayata danum dena lesa illa sitiyi.kaluthara thissa jathika pasale pariganaka guru wasantha kumara mahatha wakugadu akarmanyathawayen pelena nisa â€œbi positiwâ€ wargaye wakugaduwak awashya we.

aapadawanta lakwu rathawahana adhiwegi margayen iwath kirima sandaha rupiyal laksha wissakata aasanna mudalak waya kara atha.dakshina adhiwegi margaye di ikuth masa deka thula pamanak noyek ratha wahana ekdahas nawasiyak pamana aapadawanta lakwu bawath eewa piwisum marga walin iwathata ganimata nadaththu anshayata sidu wu bawath dakshina adhiwegi margaye meheyum adhyaksha bi. di. ke. bandara mahatha â€œdinaminaâ€ ta eeye (02) pawasiya.aapadawanta lakwana ek wahanayak melesa dakshina adhiwegi margayen iwath kirimata rupiyal dahase sita ek dahas pansiya dakwa mudalak waya kirimata nadaththu anshayata sidu wana bawa bandara mahatha penwa deyi.dakshina adhiwegi margayata piwisena wahana honda thaththwayen pawathwagena ena lesa thaman riyadurangen illa sitina bawa meheyum adhyakshawaraya awadharanaya karayi..

namuth owun kià·Šrayathmaka wenne eeta hathpasinma wiruddha paththe indalayi. 19wana sanshodhanaya senadhinayakaya, rate nayakaya, aanduwe nayakaya janadhipathiwaraya wiyayuthu bawa owunge mathayayi.mema balathala thunama thibenawa nam kalin ekeyi mekeyi kisidu wenasak wenne naha.pasugiyada labunu janawaramata anukula paà·Šrajathanthaà·Šrawadayata para kapana, janatha kamaththa sahitha me sanshodhanayata wiruddhawa kathakarana champika ranawakala pahugiya janadhipathiwarayage palana kalayedi janadhipathi dhura kalaya wasara deke simawa iwath kala, widhayaka balathala shakthimath karapu, paà·Šrajathanthaà·Šrawadaya walapallata adala damu swadhina komishan sabhawala balaya ahosi karapu 18 sanshodhanayata montisori lamayi wage atha issuwa.
